content: I did something similar a little ways back, but what the hey. There's too much arguing about politics. People get mad, etc. Something I never do( ), it's Friday & we should lighten up. (my wife and I have six and some grand kids and they don't behave that way) The other one is when you get all the way home when you remember what you forgot to stop for on the way.
reply: Hahaha, the wife and I were almost all the way home from shopping today and realized we forgot to buy new cut flowers for the dining room table. How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?
title: I Hate When That Happens!!

content: Well, I really hate it when the riding mower belt comes all the way off and I am not, plus don't know how, to fix it. It kept slipping off in three different places and I was able to put it back on. Then it came all the way off, need a new belt.....Got half of the back yard mowed. Dennis is in Sacramento right now. Anyone close to me want to lend me a hand????????????????? I think it is fixin to rain here in about 30 minutes too.
reply: Well, I really hate it when the riding mower belt comes all the way off and I am not, plus don't know how, to fix it. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.

content: I hate when I turn on ESPN to try to get a score on a game from the ticker on the bottom. The give so many details of the game and just as they are coming to my team's score.....they go to a commercial. Don
